customer_reviews.title: Painfully dried out my face
customer_reviews.text: I should have read other sites about this product. It completely dried out my skin. After 2 nights, my face was painfully flaking. customer_reviews.title: Bad reaction
customer_reviews.text: Pros - smells great. Also pro: if you don't like a product, you can return for a full refund (to the Kiehl's store). Cons - after a few days of using the serum, the skin on my face got really itchy, turned red, and broke out. I also experienced peeling, flaky skin. My review of negative experience with this product was blocked from Kiehl's web page, as they said I violated terms for posting. My review said only that the product unfortunately didn't work for me, and i experienced dry, flaky skin and redness after using. I use quite a few Kiehl's products, and am a fan in general, and I intensely dislike the suppression of negative constructive product reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Justa Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product two weeks ago and I cannot believe the difference in my skin. This is literally the ONLY product that I have used that after only two weeks I have people asking me why my skin looks so great! I only use two small drops each night and wake up to beautiful skin that just keeps getting better. I am over 50, and I cannot say enough good things about this product. Also, I SWEAR my eyelashes are growing! Thank you amazon for carrying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
